pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Negative Matrix Factorization (NMF) using CUDA // Wrapper package for the nmfgpu library, which implements several Non- negative Matrix Factorization (NMF) algorithms for CUDA platforms. By using the acceleration of GPGPU computing, the NMF can be used for real-world problems inside the R environment. All CUDA devices starting with Kepler architecture are supported by the library.
